text.value: The Parable of the Talents is very important in Liberation Theology, the radical South American movement which re-read the bible in Marxist terms to focus on social injustice and the plight of the poor. Liberation theologians identify one particular character in the parable as heroic and revolutionary. Which one?

value.value: speaks truth to power and suffers injustice - after all, he has stolen nothing
